claim_summary: The FY24 Arkansas Workforce Development Area Memorandum of Understanding, executed under the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act, describes how participating agencies and the Chief Elected Officials share resources to operate local workforce centers and establishes a budget and infrastructure funding agreement【644464397778215†L6-L20】.

source.title: FY24 Arkansas Workforce Development Area Memorandum of Understanding
source.issuing_body: Arkansas Department of Workforce Services and Local Workforce Development Boards
